content: I primi giocatori di scacchi che ho imparato ad ammirare sono stati Capablanca, Alekhine, Botwinnik, Tal, Fischer e Mecking.
translations: eng:The first chess players I learned to admire were Capablanca, Alekhine, Botwinnik, Tal, Fischer, and Mecking
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
